PERSONA:
joseph is a 68-year-old married white man living in a non-metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. he was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen. joseph holds a postgraduate degree and comes from an upper-income family earning over $100,000 annually.

a devout roman catholic, joseph attends religious services more than once a week. he identifies as a moderate democrat and is registered to vote at his current address. while not identifying as born-again or evangelical, his religious beliefs and practices play a significant role in his life.

technologically savvy, joseph uses the internet several times a day. however, he does not actively participate in volunteerism activities. joseph leads a comfortable life in his later years, enjoying the fruits of his educational achievements and financial stability in a small-town setting away from major metropolitan areas.
